00047 //
00048 //! complete l'iterateur et l'evaluateur
00049 void Op_Conv_Centre_PolyMAC_Elem::associer(const Zone_dis& zone_dis,
00050                                            const Zone_Cl_dis& zone_cl_dis,
00051                                            const Champ_Inc& ch_transporte)
00052 {
00053   const Zone_PolyMAC& zvdf = ref_cast(Zone_PolyMAC,zone_dis.valeur());
00054   const Zone_Cl_PolyMAC& zclvdf = ref_cast(Zone_Cl_PolyMAC,zone_cl_dis.valeur());
00055   const Champ_P0_PolyMAC& inco = ref_cast(Champ_P0_PolyMAC,ch_transporte.valeur());
00056 
00057   iter->associer(zvdf, zclvdf, *this);
00058 
00059   Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem& eval_conv = (Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem&) iter.evaluateur();
00060   eval_conv.associer_zones(zvdf, zclvdf );          //!< Evaluateur_PolyMAC::associer
00061   eval_conv.associer_inconnue(inco );        //!< Eval_PolyMAC_Elem::associer_inconnue
00062 }
00063 
00064 //
00065 //! associe le champ de vitesse a l'evaluateur
00066 void Op_Conv_Centre_PolyMAC_Elem::associer_vitesse(const Champ_base& ch_vit)
00067 {
00068   const Champ_Face_PolyMAC& vit = ref_cast(Champ_Face_PolyMAC, ch_vit);
00069 
00070   Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem& eval_conv = (Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem&) iter.evaluateur();
00071   eval_conv.associer(vit);                //!< Eval_Conv_PolyMAC::associer
00072 }
00073 
00074 const Champ_base& Op_Conv_Centre_PolyMAC_Elem::vitesse() const
00075 {
00076   Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem& eval_conv = (Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem&) iter.evaluateur();
00077   return eval_conv.vitesse();
00078 }
00079 
00080 Champ_base& Op_Conv_Centre_PolyMAC_Elem::vitesse()
00081 {
00082   Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem& eval_conv = (Eval_centre_PolyMAC_Elem&) iter.evaluateur();
00083   return eval_conv.vitesse();
